overview: Montana cattleman Austin Brandt is jilted by Rosemary, who elopes with stranger Royce Greer, but he is consoled by his twenty-year-old niece Joan. Rosemary later returns to Custer City to run a dance hall with her husband, who mistreats her.
tagline: Six reels of smashing melodrama masterpiece. A story of cattle ranch society life, and life at the saloons.
title: Calibre 38
